body.title: Associations
CRUD
body.elms:
```js
Book.create({ title: '..' }).save()
new Book({ title: '..' }).save()

new Book({ id: 1 }).fetch()

Book.where({ id: 1 }).fetch()
Book.where('favorite_color', 'red').fetch()
Book.where('favorite_color', '<>', 'red').fetch()
Book
  .query((q) => q.orderBy('updated_at')
```
